## 1

```markdown
This should 'be' replaced
```

This should 'be' replaced

This should "be" replaced

This should "be" replaced

## 3

```markdown
**--** *---* a...<< b>>
```

**--** *---* a...<< b>>

## 4

```markdown
Some say '90s, others say 90's, but I can't say which is best.
```

Some say '90s, others say 90's, but I can't say which is best.
